snippet: LEAD: Amid reports of scattered violence around the country in the strike against Greyhound Lines, a picketing driver was struck and killed yesterday by a bus driven by a temporary driver in California....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Amid reports of scattered violence around the country in the strike against Greyhound Lines, a picketing driver was struck and killed yesterday by a bus driven by a temporary driver in California.

headline.main: BUS DRIVER PICKET KILLED AT STATION
